record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO FRIDAY, JULY 20, 2007, AT 10 A.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO FRIDAY, JULY 20, 2007, AT 10 A.M. -- (Senate - July 19, 2007)

[Page: S9643]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:52 a.m., adjourned until, Friday, July 20, 2007, at 10 a.m.
